description: This source file defines a set of functions and callbacks for handling JSON serialization and deserialization within CMake scripts. It provides functions to build JSON objects, arrays, handle key-value pairs, literals, and manage JSON callbacks, facilitating JSON processing in CMake-based projects.

methods.name: json
methods.description: Main function to process JSON content, initialize context, and execute callbacks for nested JSON structures.

methods.name: json_obj_begin
methods.description: Callback to begin a JSON object ('{').

methods.name: json_obj_end
methods.description: Callback to end a JSON object ('}').

methods.name: json_array_begin
methods.description: Callback to begin a JSON array ('[').

methods.name: json_array_end
methods.description: Callback to end a JSON array (']').

methods.name: json_obj_keyvalue_begin
methods.description: Callback to process the beginning of a key-value pair in a JSON object.

methods.name: json_obj_keyvalue_end
methods.description: Callback to process the end of a key-value pair, inserting a comma if needed.

methods.name: json_array_element_end
methods.description: Callback to process the end of an array element, inserting a comma if needed.

methods.name: json_literal
methods.description: Handles JSON literals such as null, booleans, and numbers, converting them into JSON format.
